info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lea County through 500 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of McDonald to 20 miles southwest of Eunice Airport. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Lovington, Eunice, Tatum, Monument, Humble City, Eunice Airport, McDonald, Gladiola, Tatum Airport, Lea County Regional Airport, Industrial Airpark and Oil Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
